articles.author: Claudia Dominguez, CNN
articles.title: Over 100 firefighters respond to massive fire at boatyard in Massachusetts
articles.description: A massive boatyard in Mattapoisett, Massachusetts on Friday filled the skies above Buzzard's Bay with black smoke and damaged dozens of boats and cars as well as several structures, CNN affiliate WCVB reported.

articles.title: CNN reporter presses anti-abortion advocate: Why do I need to give something up so men can be better people? - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Elle Reeve talks to anti-abortion advocates in Boston who are working to modernize the movement following the fall of Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: Black couple sues for housing discrimination after experiment yields shocking result - CNN Video
articles.description: A Black couple in California is suing an appraiser over housing discrimination after their home was valued significantly under what they expected it to be. Their suspicions were confirmed after their White friend showed the home to another appraiser and the v…

articles.author: Gary Tuchman, Anne Clifford and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Texas is sending migrants to New York and Washington, DC, by bus. Many are glad to go
articles.description: Genesis Figueroa and her husband spent more than a month traveling from Venezuela to the US border, an exhausting journey interrupted only briefly when she was hospitalized with pneumonia in Guatemala.

articles.author: Justin Gamble and Virginia Langmaid, CNN
articles.title: Black couple sues after they say home valuation rises nearly $300,000 when shown by White colleague

articles.author: Kaitlan Collins, Kevin Liptak and Natasha Bertrand, CNN
articles.title: White House officials privately express concern about classified information taken to Mar-a-Lago
articles.description: White House officials have privately expressed deep concern over the tranche of classified material taken to former President Donald Trump's home in Florida, including some documents that are only meant to be viewed only in secure government facilities, CNN h…

articles.author: Nick Valencia, Pamela Kirkland and Tierney Sneed, CNN
articles.title: Federal judge won't put on hold ruling that Graham must appear before grand jury
articles.description: A federal judge won't put on hold her ruling that Sen. Lindsey Graham must appear before the Fulton County special grand jury that's investigating Republican efforts to overturn the 2020 presidential election results in Georgia.

articles.author: Anna Bahney, CNN Business
articles.title: Mortgage rates drop amid signs that inflation may have finally peaked
articles.description: Mortgage rates ticked lower last week, falling back toward the 5% mark following economic reports that indicated inflation might have finally peaked.

articles.author: Opinion by Orphe Divounguy for CNN Business Perspectives
articles.title: Opinion: The housing market is slowing down, but homes aren't getting cheaper anytime soon
articles.description: Many potential buyers who have been stuck on the sidelines are likely cheering this slowdown and hoping prices might fall enough for them to jump back in. But that is unlikely, at least on a grand scale.
articles.content:
Orphe Divounguy is a senior economist at Zillow. The opinions expressed in this commentary are his own.

articles.author: Anna Bahney, CNN Business
articles.title: The Black homeownership rate is now lower than it was a decade ago
articles.description: Even as home prices have skyrocketed during the pandemic, homeownership continues to grow. But the rate of home buying has not increased at the same pace for all Americans, according to a new report from the National Association of Realtors.
